row.process:
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JDBC.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Script URI" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_URI#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SQL User" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Connection String" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_JDBC_CONN#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Driver JAR URI" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_JAR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "JDBC Driver Class" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_DRIVER_CLASS#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Script Separator" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_SEPR#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Interval" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_CONN_INTRVL#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Number of Connection Retries" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_CONN_RETRY#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Oracle tnsnames.ora URI" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_TNSNAMES_ORA#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Additional Properties" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_ADD_PROP#
! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JDBC.PRV.INCLUDE.EXECUTE_SQL_STATEMENT
:IF &UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_ORDER# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND#, ' -exe_order "&UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_ORDER#"') :ENDIF
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&JDBC_TOOL_JAR#" database SQLFeature -script "&UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_URI#" ? &UC4RB_SQL_COMMAND# -sep "&UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_SEPR#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>
